title: Book Review: ‘The New Yorkers,’ by Sam Roberts
description: A new book by the veteran New York Times journalist Sam Roberts recounts the lives — and a few deaths — of some of the city’s history-making but unheralded residents.
dc:creator: Joshua Jelly-Schapiro
category: The New Yorkers: 31 Remarkable People, 400 Years, and the Untold Biography of the World's Greatest City (Book)
